news.text: New cards: Randyll Tarly, Southron Messenger, Dothraki Honor Guard, Ser Jon Fossoway, Name Day Tourney, Ulf Son of Umar, Ser Barristan Selmy (LoCR), The Prince's Plan, Summoned to Court, Queenscrown.  Various fixes.

Have reworked the way the client connects to the game nodes, this should hopefully fix the issue some of you were having connecting to port 80.  It will require you to clear your cache, however.  New cards: The Eyrie, Retaliation, Crow Killers, The Frozen Shore, Dalla.  Various fixes.  Implemented text based indicators for card counters.

Have introduced an option to specify what type of game you're looking for.  This is meant only as an indicator and does nothing more than put a banner in the game title.  New cards: Maester Aemon (WotW), Esgred, Iron Islands Market, Castle Black Mason. Added new action windows after plots are revealed and after cards stand in the standing phase.
